profile.info-desc: Update your account's profile information and email address.
profile.name: Name
profile.email-resend: Click here to re-send the verification email.
profile.email-new: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.
profile.password-info-desc: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.
profile.delete-info-desc: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain.
profile.delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
